courseDetails.title: Animals, Art and Therapy
courseDetails.shortDescription: Animal Assisted Art Therapy (AAAT)
courseDetails.longDescription:
This is a course about using animals to assist in art therapy.

But why use animals?

There are many reasons and these are discussed in the course. They include:

  • Non-Judgmental Presence: Animals provide a non-judgmental and accepting presence, which can create a safe and supportive environment for clients to express themselves creatively without fear of criticism.

  • Stress Reduction: Interacting with animals has been shown to reduce stress levels. The presence of an animal during art therapy can help clients feel more relaxed and calm, which can facilitate the therapeutic process.

  • Enhanced Engagement: Animals can help to engage clients who might otherwise be reluctant to participate in therapy. The presence of an animal can be a motivating factor that encourages clients to attend sessions and engage with the therapeutic process.

  • Increased Comfort: For individuals who struggle with social interactions, animals can serve as social lubricants, making it easier for them to open up and communicate with the therapist.

  • Emotional Support: Animals can provide emotional support and companionship, which can be particularly beneficial for clients dealing with emotional trauma, depression, or anxiety.

  • Improved Mood: Interacting with animals can increase levels of oxytocin, a hormone associated with happiness and bonding. This can help lift a client's mood and create a more positive atmosphere for art therapy.

And there are more.

But that doesn't tell you why to enrol. Anyone can just google 'AAAT' and get similar reasons to those.

This course (shot in beautiful countryside) uses LOCAL animals to prompt you to carry out animal art therapy exercises. These are animals you most probably see every day such as:

  • pigeons

  • hares

  • birds

  • mice

  • magpies

  • cats

  • dogs

  • stoat

  • robins

OK maybe not all of them but as the course uses footage of such animals shot locally, you'll be able to use these videos and exercises in art therapy for yourself or for others.

Oh yes, there's also a duck used for art therapy assistance.

The lectures are serious - but do have their funny bits!

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 320 000 students.


You will know about: what is coaching, its types, components, rules; skills and competencies of coaches, how to proceed a coaching session and coaching methods and tools. After finishing a course you will get: key knowledge about coaching and how to implement it in effective ways


The Crucial Role of Coaching Techniques in Managerial Leadership and Career Development

The role of a manager goes far beyond traditional tasks of overseeing operations and ensuring productivity. A successful manager is now expected to act as a leader, a mentor, and a coach, guiding their team members towards individual and collective success. This paradigm shift highlights the significance of coaching techniques in the realm of managerial responsibilities.


The Transformation of Managerial Roles

Evolving Leadership Expectations

The traditional image of a manager as a stern authority figure has given way to a more holistic view of leadership. Managers are now expected to serve as role models, motivators, and mentors to their teams. This shift stems from the recognition that employees perform at their best when they feel valued, supported, and empowered.

The evolution of leadership expectations can be traced back to the changing dynamics of the modern workplace. In the past, managers were primarily responsible for enforcing rules and ensuring productivity. However, as organizations began to realize that employee engagement and satisfaction were crucial for success, a transformation in managerial roles ensued.

Today, managers are not just tasked with overseeing tasks and projects; they are expected to inspire and empower their teams. This shift is partly a response to the changing nature of work itself. In a knowledge-based economy, where creativity, innovation, and adaptability are paramount, traditional top-down management no longer suffices.


Coaching as a Leadership Skill

Coaching has emerged as a pivotal leadership skill that fosters personal and professional growth. We'll explore how coaching techniques, such as active listening, constructive feedback, and goal-setting, can empower managers to become effective leaders who inspire and guide their teams towards excellence.

Coaching is not a one-size-fits-all approach; it is a dynamic and personalized method of leadership. Effective coaches adapt their style to the needs and preferences of individual team members. They actively listen to understand the unique challenges and aspirations of each employee, fostering a sense of trust and rapport.

Moreover, coaching is not merely about providing solutions but guiding employees to discover answers themselves. This approach instills a sense of ownership and accountability in team members. It encourages them to take the initiative, think critically, and develop problem-solving skills—a valuable asset in today's fast-paced, ever-changing business landscape.

Coaching also plays a crucial role in setting and achieving goals. Effective managers use coaching techniques to collaboratively define clear, actionable objectives with their team members. This process not only aligns individual efforts with organizational goals but also empowers employees to track their progress and make necessary adjustments along the way.


Coaching Knowledge for Career Development

Career Development in the Modern Workplace

Career development is a top priority for employees. Discover how coaching knowledge equips managers with the tools to help team members navigate their career paths, set meaningful goals, and continually improve their skills.

Career development has evolved from being a peripheral concern to a central focus in the modern workplace. In an era marked by rapid technological advancements and industry disruptions, employees recognize the importance of continuous learning and skill enhancement to remain relevant and competitive.

This heightened emphasis on career development places managers at the forefront of helping their team members chart their professional journeys. Coaching knowledge equips managers with the ability to provide guidance that is not only aligned with the organization's needs but also tailored to the aspirations of individual employees.

One of the key advantages of coaching in career development is its ability to facilitate self-awareness. Effective coaches help employees identify their strengths, weaknesses, interests, and values. Armed with this self-knowledge, employees can make informed career decisions that align with their passions and long-term goals.


The Manager as a Career Development Partner

Explore the responsibilities of middle and top managers in preparing and mentoring personal development plans for their team members. Learn how these plans can align with organizational objectives and create a win-win situation for both employees and the company.

Managers who actively engage in career development become indispensable partners in their employees' professional growth. They play a pivotal role in creating personalized development plans that leverage individual strengths and address areas needing improvement.

These development plans not only benefit the employees but also the organization. By aligning individual development goals with the company's strategic objectives, managers ensure that every team member's growth contributes to the overall success of the business.

Furthermore, coaching techniques are instrumental in fostering a growth mindset within teams. Managers can use coaching to encourage employees to embrace challenges, persist in the face of setbacks, and view failures as opportunities for learning and improvement. This mindset shift has a profound impact on team performance and innovation.


Coaching for Internal Education and Employee Development

The Role of Managers in Internal Education

Managers often bear the responsibility of nurturing a culture of learning within their teams and organizations. Explore how coaching methods can be instrumental in identifying and addressing skill gaps, fostering innovation, and supporting ongoing employee development.

Organizations that prioritize learning and development gain a competitive edge. Managers are at the forefront of this initiative, serving as the catalysts for continuous improvement and innovation within their teams.

Coaching methods play a pivotal role in identifying and addressing skill gaps. By regularly assessing the competencies of their team members, managers can tailor training and development programs to bridge these gaps effectively. This proactive approach not only enhances individual skills but also bolsters the organization's overall capabilities.

Moreover, coaching encourages a culture of innovation. Effective coaches inspire creativity and critical thinking in their teams. They challenge employees to question the status quo, explore new ideas, and experiment with novel approaches. In this way, managers act as innovation champions, driving progress and adaptability.


Coaching as a Tool for Employee Empowerment

Employee empowerment is a cornerstone of effective leadership. Coaching techniques provide managers with the tools to empower their team members by fostering a sense of ownership and autonomy in their roles.

One of the primary ways coaching empowers employees is by promoting self-directed learning. Instead of relying solely on formal training programs, employees learn to identify their development needs and take initiative in seeking resources and opportunities for growth. Managers who coach effectively encourage this proactive approach.

Furthermore, coaching cultivates a growth-oriented mindset among employees. When team members receive regular feedback, both positive and constructive, they become more receptive to continuous improvement. They view challenges as opportunities for growth and development, which ultimately leads to higher levels of engagement and performance.

By creating an environment where continuous learning is celebrated, managers inspire their teams to thrive in an ever-changing business landscape. This culture of learning becomes a strategic advantage for organizations, as it enables them to adapt quickly to new challenges and opportunities.


Coaching for Mental Health and Well-being

The Manager as a Trusted Support System

For many employees, especially those who live alone or lack a strong support network, a manager can become their most trusted confidant. Understand how coaching methods extend beyond professional development to support the mental health and well-being of team members.

The relationship between a manager and their team members extends beyond the confines of the workplace. In some cases, a manager may be the primary source of support for an employee, especially when they are facing personal challenges or seeking guidance related to their mental health and well-being.

Coaching methods are not limited to career development; they encompass the whole spectrum of an employee's life. Effective managers create an environment where team members feel comfortable discussing personal challenges and seeking guidance when needed. This trust and openness are essential for maintaining employee well-being.

In situations where employees are dealing with stress, anxiety, or other mental health issues, managers with coaching skills can provide valuable support. They can listen empathetically, offer guidance on stress management techniques, and help employees access appropriate resources for professional help when necessary.


Coaching for Life Questions and Personal Challenges

Life is filled with complexities, and employees often grapple with personal challenges that can affect their work performance and overall well-being. Managers who are skilled in coaching can offer valuable guidance during these times of need.

One area where coaching is particularly beneficial is work-life balance. In today's fast-paced world, employees often struggle to juggle their professional and personal responsibilities. Managers can use coaching techniques to help team members set boundaries, manage their time effectively, and achieve a healthier work-life balance.

Coaching also proves invaluable in navigating interpersonal relationships, both within and outside the workplace. Managers can offer insights into effective communication, conflict resolution, and building positive relationships, which can significantly impact an employee's overall quality of life.

In times of personal crisis or uncertainty, such as major life transitions or unexpected challenges, employees may turn to their managers for guidance. Managers trained in coaching can provide a supportive and non-judgmental space for employees to explore their feelings, identify potential solutions, and develop action plans to address these challenges.


In conclusion, coaching techniques have become indispensable in the modern workplace, particularly within the roles of managers and leaders. These skills not only drive career development and internal education but also play a crucial role in supporting the mental health and well-being of employees.

As we navigate an ever-changing professional landscape, organizations that recognize the importance of coaching will not only foster a culture of continuous improvement but also cultivate a loyal and motivated workforce. Managers who embrace coaching as a core aspect of their leadership style will not only elevate their own careers but also become catalysts for the success of their teams and organizations as a whole.

By understanding and implementing coaching techniques effectively, managers can truly transform the workplace into an environment where individuals thrive, careers flourish, and holistic well-being is nurtured.

courseDetails.title: [NEW] PL-900: Power Platform Fundamentals Practice Exams
courseDetails.shortDescription: Qualify PL-900 in First Attempt | 100% Syllabus | Complete Explanations, References, Updated Questions and Cheat Sheets
courseDetails.longDescription:
This learning path is designed to help you prepare for the PL-900: Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals exam. These full-length mock tests with 167 different questions.

This exam is part of Microsoft’s role-based certification program. Candidates who pass the PL-900 exam will earn the Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Fundamentals certification.


These practice sets measure your ability to accomplish the following technical tasks: design business solutions; analyze and visualize data; and create business solutions.


The content in this path can help you kickstart your exam preparation and build the beginning foundation for your journey to becoming a Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Fundamentals .

These practice exams supplement each exam blueprint guide and help an individual test their knowledge before taking the final exam.

Azure  PL-900 Exam Objectives:

  • Describe the business value of Microsoft Power Platform (20–25%)

  • Identify foundational components of Microsoft Power Platform (10–15%)

  • Demonstrate the capabilities of Power BI (10–15%)

  • Demonstrate the capabilities of Power Apps (20–25%)

  • Demonstrate the capabilities of Power Automate (15–20%)

  • Demonstrate complementary Microsoft Power Platform solutions (15–20%)

Focal Points of Course:


  • TOP-NOTCH Questions  – These questions closely emulate the actual exam in both their style and content, complemented by comprehensive explanations and useful reference links


  • COMPHREHENSIVE EXPLANATIONS AND REFERENCE LINKS - Each response is accompanied by an in-depth explanation and links to Microsoft documentation.


  • INTERACTIVE DISCUSSION BORAD- Engage in active Q&A discussion section by sharing your questions and  allowing us to address and deliberate on any concern

    .

  • HIGHLY RESPONSIVE INSTRUCTOR – Expect most of your inquiries to receive a response within 2-3 working days.


  • ALWAYS UP TO DATE – These practice tests are continually refreshed with new questions, incorporating student feedback and with the latest changes released by Microsoft for  PL-900. Course covers 100% exam syllabus.


  • IMMACULATE QUESTIONS WITH NO ERRORS – Each question undergoes peer review and Grammarly verification.


  • COMPILED BY A CERTIFIED MULTI-CLOUD EXPERT WHO SUCCESSFULLY ACED -

    • Microsoft Certified Trainer,

    • Microsoft Certified Cybersecurity Architect Expert,

    • Microsoft Certified Azure Solutions Architect Expert,

    • Microsoft Certified Azure DevOps Expert,

    • Microsoft Certified Azure Security Engineer,

    • Microsoft Certified Azure Data Engineer,

    • Microsoft Certified Azure Network Engineer,

    • Microsoft Certified Azure Administrator,

    • Microsoft Certified Azure Fundamentals,

    • Microsoft Certified Azure Data Fundamentals,

    • Certified Kubernetes Administrator,

    • AWS Certified Solutions Architect.


  • 30-Days MONEY BACK GUARANTEE

Important topics covered in Questionnaire:

  • Describe the business value of Microsoft Power Platform services

  • Describe the business value of extending business solutions by using Microsoft

  • Power Platform

  • Describe Microsoft Power Platform administration and security

  • Describe Microsoft Dataverse

  • Describe Connectors

  • Identify common Power BI components

  • Connect to and consume data

  • Build a basic dashboard using Power BI

  • Identify common Power Apps components

  • Build a basic canvas app

  • Build a basic model-driven app

  • Identify common Power Automate components

  • Build a basic cloud flow

  • Describe the capabilities of Power Virtual Agents in Microsoft Teams

  • Build and publish a basic chatbot


Happy Learning and All the Best!
targetAudiences: IT Professionals who want to learn Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals
IT Professionals preparing for Microsoft’s PL-900 exam
Good technical exposure with Microsoft Power Platform
Those IT Professionals who are interested in passing the Azure PL-900 exam
IT teams who want to learn more about the Identify the Core Components of Power Platform, including Dataverse (CDS), Connectors and AI Builder

Développez votre présence en ligne avec l'intelligence artificielle !

Vous rêvez de créer un site Web professionnel pour votre entreprise, mais vous n'avez ni les compétences techniques ni le temps pour apprendre à coder ? Notre cours "Créer un Site Web BUSINESS avec l'IA en 30min (sans coder)" est la solution idéale pour vous !

Ce que vous allez apprendre :

  • Sélection facile de l'hébergeur : Apprenez à choisir le meilleur hébergeur adapté à vos besoins avec une option pack IA pour une performance optimale.

  • Économie assurée : Découvrez comment sélectionner les meilleures périodes et appliquer des coupons pour réaliser des économies significatives.

  • Création automatique : Maîtrisez l'utilisation du créateur intelligent pour générer automatiquement votre site en quelques clics.

  • Nom de domaine pertinent : Utilisez un générateur innovant pour trouver le nom de domaine parfait qui reflète l'essence de votre entreprise.

  • Connexion de domaine existant : Intégrez facilement un nom de domaine que vous possédez déjà à votre nouveau site.

  • Personnalisation à l'infini : Choisissez parmi une variété de modèles et apprenez à les modifier complètement pour qu'ils correspondent à votre image de marque.

  • Navigation intuitive dans le backoffice : Découvrez les secrets d'une gestion efficace de votre site à travers un backoffice convivial.

  • Mise à jour visuelle : Apprenez à mettre à jour votre logo et vos images pour un impact visuel maximal.

  • Gestion de la galerie d'images : Gérez facilement votre galerie d'images pour garder votre site attrayant et à jour.

Pour qui ce cours est-il destiné ?

Ce cours est parfait pour les entrepreneurs, les petites entreprises, les freelances et toute personne souhaitant établir rapidement une présence en ligne professionnelle sans se plonger dans les complexités du codage.

Rejoignez-nous et transformez votre vision en réalité numérique en seulement 30 minutes. Inscrivez-vous maintenant et commencez à bâtir votre succès en ligne avec l'IA !

Notez bien :

La formation se déroulera sous forme de cours théorique & pratique, d'exemples concrets et d'ateliers pour permettre aux participants de mettre en pratique les concepts appris. Des exercices, des mises en situation et des études de cas seront utilisés pour renforcer les connaissances.


Ressources d’apprentissage complémentaires :

  • Atelier en ligne

  • Documentation

  • Consultez des exemples de tableaux de bord, de rapports et de fichiers de bureau.

Enfin, je m'engage à vous fournir la formation la plus complète possible sur Udemy pour vous permettre de réussir dans votre apprentissage.

  • Je m'engage à répondre rapidement à vos questions pour vous aider à comprendre les concepts de la formation.

  • Je vais ajouter des cas pratiques sur demande pour vous donner des exemples concrets de ce que vous apprenez.

  • Je vais vous accompagner avec des cas pratiques et d'autres ressources utiles pour vous aider à mettre en pratique ce que vous apprenez.

Ces ajouts de vidéos seront, bien entendu, gratuits si vous avez acquis la formation.

Comment me contacter ? Je reste disponible dans la rubrique Question/Réponses d'Udemy pour répondre à vos questions.

À la fin de ce cours, si vous le suivez en entier et réussissez l'ensemble des quizz : Obtenez votre certification électronique à insérer dans votre CV et profil LinkedIn.

Dr. Firas

courseDetails.longDescription:
Maven Interview Questions and Answers Preparation Practice Test | Freshers to Experienced | [Updated 2024]

Are you preparing for a Maven-related job interview or just looking to test your knowledge of Maven, one of the most widely used build automation tools in the Java ecosystem? Welcome to the Maven Interview Questions Practice Test course! This comprehensive practice test course is designed to help you master Maven concepts, commands, and best practices through a series of challenging questions and scenarios.

Practice Test Questions Galore:

  • Our course is packed with hundreds of carefully crafted multiple-choice questions that cover each subtopic in detail.

  • These questions are designed to simulate real-world scenarios you might encounter in a Maven-related job interview.

Comprehensive Coverage:

  • Whether you are a beginner or have some experience with Maven, this course offers a wide range of questions to cater to your skill level.

  • From the basics of Maven to advanced usage and troubleshooting, we've got you covered.

Detailed Explanations:

  • After each question, you'll receive detailed explanations and references to help you understand the concepts better.

  • It's not just about the answers; it's about learning from the explanations.

Whether you're aiming for that dream job, looking to excel in your current role, or simply want to validate your Maven skills, our Maven Interview Questions Practice Test course is the perfect choice. Join us today and take the first step towards Maven mastery!

Enroll now and test your knowledge with real-world Maven interview questions and scenarios. Your future career in Maven development awaits!
targetAudiences: Aspiring Software Developers: Individuals who are looking to kickstart their careers in software development, especially in Java-based projects, will find this course invaluable. It provides them with a strong foundation in Maven, a tool widely used in the industry.

Experienced Developers: Seasoned developers who want to enhance their proficiency in Maven, whether for personal development or to excel in their current roles. This course offers an opportunity to test their existing knowledge and bridge any gaps.
Job Seekers: Those actively searching for Maven-related job opportunities. The course prepares them with the skills and confidence required to perform well in Maven-related job interviews.

Students and Graduates: Students pursuing degrees in computer science or related fields, as well as recent graduates, can leverage this course to gain practical Maven knowledge, making them more attractive candidates to potential employers.
Java Enthusiasts: Java enthusiasts and hobbyists who want to expand their knowledge of Java build automation and project management will find this course informative and engaging.
Project Managers: Project managers and team leads who work with Java development teams and want to understand Maven better to manage projects more effectively.
Anyone Interested in Maven: Even if you're simply curious about what Maven is and how it works, this course provides a user-friendly introduction to Maven's concepts and practices.

Google Ads is a powerful tool that can help you reach your target audience, increase your website traffic, and generate leads. courseDetails.title: GRE - GMAT | Advanced Learners | Math Marathon

courseDetails.longDescription:
Elevate Your GRE & GMAT Prep to the Highest Level with Our Ultimate Test-Day Preparation Course!

Are you on the verge of taking the GRE or GMAT and want to ensure you're ready for every curveball the quantitative section might throw at you? Look no further! Our GRE & GMAT Ultimate Test-Day Prep Course is the final step in your journey towards conquering these exams.

Here's why this course is your passport to success:

  1. Mastering the Trickiest Concepts: Not every question in this course is a mind-boggler, and not all are a breeze. We've meticulously curated a collection of questions that delve into those sneaky concepts frequently tested in GRE and GMAT quantitative sections. This course isn't for beginners; it's for those with a basic understanding of word problem concepts.

  2. Complementary Courses: If you're just starting out, consider pairing this course with our GRE | Quantitative | Master Course or GMAT | Quantitative | Math Master Course to build a solid foundation.

  3. Tackling the Uncharted Territory: There are always those elusive concepts that don't neatly fit into defined GRE or GMAT categories. We've got them covered! We address these "grey areas" by providing 165 meticulously solved questions across four sections, covering percentages, ratios & proportions, averages, probability, geometry, rates, and IQ & logical-type questions.

  4. Shortcut Mastery: Most questions in this course are solved using clever shortcut techniques, while some are explained through both shortcuts and conventional methods. Understanding the logic behind shortcuts boosts your confidence on test day, even if you choose not to use them.

  5. A Journey of Growth: Our journey is just beginning! We're committed to expanding this course into a 50+ hour treasure trove with over 1000 GRE and GMAT level questions.

  6. Comprehensive Content: While we've started with problem-solving questions, our roadmap includes Quantitative Comparison and Data Sufficiency sections in the future.

This course is tailor-made for advanced-level students, featuring GRE content at the 320+ level and GMAT content at the 700+ level. It's your bridge to the score you've been aiming for.

Don't let the GRE and GMAT intimidate you. Join our Ultimate Test-Day Prep Course, and embark on the journey to GRE and GMAT success. Secure your spot today, and prepare to shine on test day!
